title: Elementary School AR-Based Language Learning Curriculum Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and foundational language education concepts
context.additional_context: An AR-based language education course for current teachers training elementary school teachers at vocational training institutions

learning_goals: Learners can design at least three elementary language learning contents using AR technology.
Learners apply instructional strategies that improve learner engagement in AR-based activities by over 20%.
Learners develop a word-image association learning module using smartphone-based AR tools.
Learners measure the effectiveness of AR lessons (engagement/achievement) through formative assessments at least three times.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
